page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT & TRADE
page.content:
12 CONTINUED
{BETTY'S BOUTIQUE}is a clothes shop which has been open for 15 years and is open all the year round. {REEKIES}is a grocers which has been open since 1973 and is closed only on Christmas and New Year's Day. {FALKLAND CRAFTS}has been open since 1984.It is a craft shop specialising in basket weaving. {BEVERIDGES}has a reputation as an antique string instruments seller i.e. Violins,Cellos,Violas and Bass's {FALKLAND ANTIQUES}has been open for about a year.It sells most antiques and does not specialise in anything. {SIMPLY GIFTED}mainly sells leather goods but animal furs are included. Recently it has changed hands and may sell different goods.{ more on next page
